medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on laid paper
title: The Last Supper (recto); Adoration of the Shepherds (verso)
description: recto:  figures seated around a table at left; some standing figures at right; dog, LRC; Jesus seated, left of center, with a zigzag halo; verso:  bottom half of sheet--Mary, Joseph and two other figures seated in a semicircle around baby Jesus; Mary and Joseph have zigzag halos; top half of sheet--light black chalk sketch of Madonna and Child
